wikipedia_page.main: William Johnstone (4 November 1864 – 11 December 1950) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward for Third Lanark and Scotland. A versatile player, he is recorded as having featured on the left wing, in the centre and at inside forward for club and country.

response: * 4 November – William Johnstone (d. 1950), Scotland international in three matches (1887–1890).
